body.source: Tokens = Number of tokens in the text (cat file.txt | preprocess --abbr=bin/abbr.txt | wc -l) (or: "ccat -l sme -r" instead of "cat", if input is corpus files in our xml format) Parses = Number of parses given (number of the following command, minus the number of tokens) (cat file.txt | preprocess --abbr=bin/abbr.txt | lookup -flags mbTT -utf8 bin/sme.fst | lookup2cg | vislcg3 --g=src/sme-dis.rle | wc -l CorrTag = Number of tokens that did not have their correct tag removed (This number must be manually arrived at: Tokens - errouneous_analyses Ambiguity = #Parses / #Tokens Precision = #CorrTag / # Parses Recall = #CorrTag / # Tokens
